meanings.definition: Not organized or structured as an institution.
meanings.sent1: The children in the neighborhood had a noninstitutionalized club where they played games together.
meanings.sent2: The artist's noninstitutionalized approach to painting allowed for more creativity and freedom.
meanings.sent3: The noninstitutionalized picnic in the park turned into a spontaneous dance party.
meanings.sent4: Her noninstitutionalized style of cooking was like a burst of flavors in every dish.
meanings.sent5: The noninstitutionalized garden grew wild and free, with flowers blooming wherever they pleased.

meanings.definition: Not confined to or associated with an institution.
meanings.sent1: The noninstitutionalized support group met at different locations each week to reach more people.
meanings.sent2: His noninstitutionalized beliefs about education led him to homeschool his children.
meanings.sent3: The noninstitutionalized book club had members from all walks of life.
meanings.sent4: The noninstitutionalized music festival brought together artists from various genres.
meanings.sent5: Her noninstitutionalized fashion sense was a mix of vintage and modern pieces.
